comment._content: Very funny, Bobo means fool or stupid in spanish...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A Bobo family genealogy site webpages.charter.net/blankenstein/new_page_65.htm (and linked pages) have several Thomas Bobo's. For this family, at least, the name "Bobo" seems to be a simplification of "Baubeau." One possibility from that page is THOMAS HAMPTON BOBO b. 1836, New Prospect, Union Co., SC; m. (2) LAVINIA b. 1856 SC . Thomas was the 11th of twelve children, with several sisters. His parents: JEREMIAH BOBO was born 07 Sep 1788, in New Prospect, Union Co., SC, and died 17 Oct 1855, in Union Co., SC. He married MARY DODD 1818 in Union Co., SC. She was born 1802 in SC, and died 19 Oct 1871, in Union Co., SC.
